content: कुलं {@--1@} A race, family; निदानमिक्ष्वाकुकुलस्य संततेः <ls>R. 3. 1.</ls> {@--2@} The residence of a family, a seat, house, an abode; वसन्नृषिकुलेषु सः <ls>R. 12. 25.</ls> {@--3@} A high or noble family, noble descent; कुले जन्म <ls>Pt. 5. 2</ls>; कुलशीलसमन्वितः <ls>Ms. 7. 54</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 7.">62</ls>; so कुलजा, कुलकन्यका &c. {@--4@} A herd, troop, flock; collection, multitude; मृगकुलं रोमंथमभ्यस्यतु <ls>Ś. 2. 6</ls>; <ls>U. 2. 9</ls>; अलिकुलसंकुल <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 71</ls>; so गो°, कृमि°, महिषी° &c. {@--5@} A lot, gang, band (in a bad sense). {@--6@} A country. {@--7@} The body. {@--8@} The front or fore part. {@--9@} A tribe, caste, community. {@--10@} A blue stone. --लः The head of a guild or corporation.
